meanings.definition: Of poor quality or inferior workmanship.
meanings.sent1: The shoddiest chair in the room wobbled when sat on.
meanings.sent2: The shoddiest shoes fell apart after just a few days of wear.
meanings.sent3: The shoddiest umbrella flipped inside out at the first gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: The shoddiest excuses crumbled under the slightest scrutiny.
meanings.sent5: The shoddiest painting looked like a child's finger-painting gone wrong.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of care or attention to detail.
meanings.sent1: The shoddiest report had spelling mistakes on every page.
meanings.sent2: Her shoddiest attempt at baking resulted in a burnt cake.
meanings.sent3: The shoddiest attempt at a magic trick left the audience unimpressed.
meanings.sent4: His shoddiest attempt at a joke fell flat with no one laughing.
meanings.sent5: The shoddiest wrapping job left the gift looking messy and unappealing.
